apply.jobClosed: Applications for this job are currently closed

validation.salaryMin: Salary expectation must be a positive number

screeningGuidance.title: ðŸ’¡ Answer Truthfully
screeningGuidance.message: Please answer these questions honestly. If your answer doesn't match a requirement, don't worry! You can explain your situation in the 'Additional Notes' section at the end. We'll review your justification fairly.
